subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: At 76, Jerry Colangelo is back in the N.B.A. to advise and restore credibility to the 76ers, who could also benefit from some veteran voices in the locker room.
snippet: At 76, Jerry Colangelo is back in the N.B.A. to advise and restore credibility to the 76ers, who could also benefit from some veteran voices in the locker room.
